ing: 2 russet potatoes, sliced into 1/4 inch slices
1 large onion, cut into 1/4-inch thick rings
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "My husband and developed this recipe to go with steaks as an alternative to mashed potatoes."
ins: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the potatoes and onions. Cook until the onions are golden brown and the potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Stir in the blue cheese and bacon, continue to cook until the blue cheese begins to melt. Season with salt and pepper.
